price: (Yεbεka akyerε agyidiefoͻ no sε): ”Woi na yεde hyεε mo bͻ no; εwͻ nipa biara a ͻsakraa n’adwen na ͻhwε (ahyεdeε no nyinaa) so yie.
arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hādhā mā tūʿadūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓin
